## SARA Statistics Winter School {background-color="#003262"}

- Registered: 12; Attended = 11.

- 30-35 hours of teaching data science.

- 07 days of food and accommodation for all the participants.

- Provided fellowship around 26 thousand rupees to 11 participants.
